channel.title: Posts on Thoughts in a pond

item.title: The Foundation
item.description: “I work for an independent scientific research institution with a specialist focus on the containment of hazardous anomalous phenomena. We have an international mandate and formidable resources and… unimaginable responsibilities. We… we watch the blizzard. And we guard the little fire. We’re called the Foundation.” - There Is No Antimemetics Division
